name: Downpour (itch) (Frisk17, Vitor Amado, Jammmz)
description:
Will you survive your own mistake?

CONTROLS:

  • A and D to move right and left
  • W to jump up
  • Right click to switch forms
  • Left click in crossbow form to shoot

CREDITS:

Programmer: Frisk17

Artist: Jammerz (Check out his itch page)

Writing and Concept: Awesome3475

Music and SFX: Vitor Amado
